title: The rights you might not realize you have - Shannon Odell

multiple-choice.question: What movement has been sweeping courts around the world since 2015, with young plaintiffs suing their governments for inaction on tackling climate change?
What document was adopted by the newly-formed United Nations in 1948, outlining human rights for the first time?

options.label: B
options.text: The Universal Declaration of Human Rights (UDHR)

multiple-choice.question: What right was first recognized at the national level, but later advocated for internationally, as being essential to human well-being?

options.label: B
options.text: The right to a healthy environment

multiple-choice.question: What is the estimated number of countries and jurisdictions that have enshrined the right to a healthy environment into national legislation?
